title: Looking for a 5v5 ranked team!
body:
Hello! I am currently Gold 5 and looking for a ranked team to play on. Preferably would like a Gold ranked team! Feel free to search up my ranked stats. Can do all lanes.
IGN: Xiaoma
Thanks for your time and I hope you all have a wonderful day! :)

replies.body: But beware! He bites like a toxic snake but looks nothing as hot as {{champion:69}} and also flames more than {{champion:63}} {{champion:1}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}
